\begin{tikzpicture}

\definecolor{darkgray176}{RGB}{176,176,176}

\begin{axis}[
tick align=outside,
tick pos=left,
x grid style={darkgray176},
xmin=0.022394477, xmax=0.71377841,
xtick style={color=black},
y grid style={darkgray176},
ymin=0.13853395, ymax=0.96071695,
ytick style={color=black}
]
\addplot [
  mark=*,
  only marks,
  scatter,
  scatter/@post marker code/.code={%
  \endscope
},
  scatter/@pre marker code/.code={%
  \expanded{%
  \noexpand\definecolor{thispointdrawcolor}{RGB}{\drawcolor}%
  \noexpand\definecolor{thispointfillcolor}{RGB}{\fillcolor}%
  }%
  \scope[draw=thispointdrawcolor, fill=thispointfillcolor]%
},
  visualization depends on={value \thisrow{draw} \as \drawcolor},
  visualization depends on={value \thisrow{fill} \as \fillcolor}
]
table{%
x  y  draw  fill
0.68235186 0.1759059 0,255,0 255,153,0
0.053821019 0.81209451 0,0,255 0,255,0
0.22035987 0.923345 0,255,255 0,0,255
0.18437181 0.2765744 255,0,0 0,255,255
};
\end{axis}

\end{tikzpicture}
